DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the effectiveness of 3D (3dimensional)renal ultrasound to check kidney perfusion (to see if the kidney is receiving enough blood flow to function as it should) in pre-mature and/or very low birth weight babies.
DOC.criteria: Very low birth weight babies in ICU in stable condition and/or premature babies in ICU in stable condition Unstable very low birth weight/premature babies
